meta.description: Select candidates to minimize salary while meeting budget, skill, and experience constraints.

sets.name: CANDIDATES
sets.description: Set of candidates available for hiring.

params.name: experience
params.description: Project management experience in years for each candidate.

vars.name: hire
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a candidate is hired.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total salary cost of hired candidates.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Total salary must not exceed the budget.

constraints.name: max_employees_constraint
constraints.description: A maximum of 4 candidates can be hired.

constraints.name: skill_level_constraint
constraints.description: Total skill level of hired candidates must be at least 8.

constraints.name: experience_constraint
constraints.description: Total project management experience must be at least 8 years.

constraints.name: mutual_exclusion_G_J
constraints.description: At most one of candidates G and J can be hired.
